attributes.action:
Make Andy Burnham labour leader...
Runner for Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details: Born in the Old Roan area of Aintree, Merseyside, on the border of Liverpool, Burnham was educated at local comprehensive schools and graduated with a degree in English from Fitzwilliam College at the University of Cambridge.
attributes.background: Andrew Murray Burnham is a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament for Leigh since 2001 and the Shadow Home Secretary since 2015.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
